successes.title: Brooklinen: All the quality, only a fraction of the price!
successes.description: We offer great sheets direct-to-consumers without forcing them to compromise on quality, style or price.

Pledges.description: A thank you note and special acknowledgement on the Brooklinen website
A hand made Brooklinen tote bag, the very same one our sheets come in. If you can't spring for a set of sheets, at least show you're stylish and supportive of our cause.

Our Core Set, in your choice of size and color/pattern.  The Core Set is great for giving us a try and includes 2 pillow cases, a flat sheet and a fitted sheet. It's a perfect way to upgrade your sheets for Spring.

The Core Set (with International Shipping).  Please check the table in the project description for the applicable surcharge for your selected destination country and then add the surcharge to your pledge amount.  For example, if you are ordering one Core Set for delivery to Western Europe, please pledge $135 ($100 + $35 surcharge).
The Presale Hardcore Set- an early bird offer for our early backers.

Please check the table in the project description for the applicable surcharge for your selected destination country and then add the surcharge to your pledge amount.  For example, if you are ordering one Presale Hardcore Set for delivery to Western Europe, please pledge $190 ($135 + $55 surcharge).

The Hardcore Set - Overhaul your sleep experience and equip yourself for all seasons with 4 pillow cases, a flat sheet, a fitted sheet and a duvet cover, in your choice of size and color/pattern. You can't find a better value than this!

Please check the table in the project description for the applicable surcharge for your selected destination country and then add the surcharge to your pledge amount.  For example, if you are ordering one Hardcore Set for delivery to Western Europe, please pledge $205 ($150 + $55 surcharge).
